title: What is the title?
text: This is the global index file.

title: 2  Parameter Test
text:
2.1 Introduction
This report uses data taken from the mtcars data frame. This is what the first 10 rows of mtcars look like:

data <- get(params$dataName)
data %>%  head(params$rowCount) %>% kable()

Here’s a graph of wt against mpg grouped by cyl:

data %>%
  ggplot() +
    geom_point(
      aes(
        x=get(params$x),
        y=get(params$y),
        group=!! {{ params$g }}
      )
    ) +
    labs(
      title=params$plotTitle,
      x=params$x,
      y=params$y
    ) +
    theme_light()
